DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Early Stages Chronic Kidney Disease ( GFR≧30ml/min/1.73㎡ ) Must able commmunicate Chinese Taiwanese Muse voluntarily attend Patient exercise regularly Patient whose blood pressure high 140/90 mmHg Patient overweight BMI＞25kg/㎡ Patient limit exercise
